```{r}
devtools::document()
pkgload::load_all()
options(tt_bootstrapOptions_placement = "H")
x <- mtcars[1:12, 1:8]
tt(x, output = "html") |> 
group_bootstrap(
indent = 1,
i = c(
"I like (fake) hamburgers" = 3,
"She prefers halloumi" = 4,
"They love tofu" = 7)) |> cat(file = "~/Downloads/trash.html")
```
